signup_free_msg: Create your free OpinionBar account today and join our online community
givepinionmsg: Cast your opinion in our online surveys and help companies to improve their products
get_paidmsg: Choose to be paid or to support a charity of your choice
opbar_make_your_voice_msg: With OpinionBar, millions of people express their opinion every year and tell the large organizations what they think of their products, services, websites and advertisement.
opbar_privacy_msg: OpinionBar values the privacy of your personal data. That's why surveys are anonymous, we never share personal data with third parties and your data is protected by SSL.
opbar_fortune__companies_msg: We work together with Fortune 500 companies from all over the world.
weekpwdMsg: New password is too weak (must have 8 characters)
samePwdError: Old password and New Password can't match
formsg: Please complete the following fields to change your password
